short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to improve productivity and reduce distractions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Simple Focus Timer Extension for Google Chrome. It helps users improve productivity by breaking their workshops, meetings and any other work into focused intervals. The extension allows users to start a timed session, from 1 minute to 120 minutes, with an audible alert on timer completing.
